header.message: Tahzeeb Institute is a specialized online platform for religious education. Tahzeeb Institute is at your side to meet all the needs of Islamic knowledge. Stay with Tahzeeb Institute to learn anything about Islam at home.

upcoming.eventDesc: Cultural development is a very important issue for building a smart Bangladesh, realizing the need, the Honorable Prime Minister has given an order to bring out talented people at the grass root level. Keeping that order in mind, we, the ACADEMY family have taken up the endeavor to bring forward and train the talented people of Rajshahi Division, which can take a major form with the help of the Government.

support.ans1: Select the course of your choice
support.ans2: Go to payment option and make payment
support.ans3: All questions will be answered in a very organized manner through private discord groups
support.ans4: Weekly/Monthly with Live Problem Solving facility with Mentor
support.ans5: At the end of the course, our job panel will give you ultimate guidelines to get your dream job

onlineSeminar.title1: Participate free online seminars to get
onlineSeminar.desc: Attend our free seminars to get the right guidance to build a successful career. You can clear your confusion through question and answer in these seminars.

course1.title: Advance Python Programming
course1.desc: This Python course makes programming very easy and covers all topics from basic to advanced.

course2.title: Web Design Mastery
course2.desc: All topics from basic to advanced to become a skilled web designer are taught through projects

faq.desc: Take a look at how we walk you through each step

qna1.ans: Each of our content is created with direct support, guidance and feedback from the industry's top experts.

qna2.ans: If you have any problem while doing the course, you will get the solution from our experienced mentors only by contacting during the specified support hours.

qna3.ans: Market standard practical projects and assignments will be done, which you can add to your portfolio.

qna4.ans: If you want to do freelancing after the course, you will be given detailed guidelines and support.

qna5.ans: Job candidate profiles of the best performers will be shared directly with our partner organizations.

qna6.ans: Get direct support for your CV, LinkedIn profile, GitHub profile and job interviews from us.

qna7.ans: At the end of the course you will be graded on your performance. Accordingly you will get certificate.

qna8.ans: You can learn from our course learning materials at your own convenient time and pace.

discordSupport.desc: For each course we have created a private Discord support channel where the course instructor along with 4-5 course moderators will directly answer your various questions. We promise to answer your questions within 24 hours maximum. But in most cases you will get the answer in less time than that. Besides, there will be live sessions every week where you can directly ask questions and get answers.

team.desc: Our teacher panel are graduates from universities in Bangladesh and outside Bangladesh

footer.title: We are here to share our skills, techniques and educational knowledge for the future.
